String.string: Itâ€™s an emergency recall order. Report to Raciel in Tulufan.
Go to Tulufan and speak with Brurun.
Deliver the news about Elleon to Baruch in Tulufan.
Meet Orlaith at the Crusader Camp. [Use the {@LinkCreature:66#1015#Teleportal} to go to Crusader Camp.]
Find Elsine in the Cathedral Redoubt far south in the Shattered City.
Find Rendalf in the Dark Cathedral.
Eliminate Nurkrasid, Valursus, and Masakrad and take their mementos of sacrifice.
Activate the {@linkobject:31#summoning stone} in the Chapterhouse of the Dark Cathedral to summon Libtrixas.
Deliver the news to Runha that you have defeated Libtrixas.
